comments.body: It should return `Promise<Buffer> | NodeJS.WritableStream | NodeJS.ReadableStream`, right? https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/wiki/What%27s-new-in-TypeScript#intersection-types

Not according to the api documentation: https://www.npmjs.com/package/download#downloadurl-destination-options

> Returns both a Promise<Buffer> and a Duplex stream with additional events.
